Wilson-Zwick help

Node looks like this. Node has a name in the center and discoverd distance (N1.d) below.

Also in top right it shows if the node is active.

Node that is discovered turns red like this.

Also this node is not active.

Nodes that are solved are green like this.

Edges look like this. Edge has its weight c(N1, N2) above.

When edge is appended to P queue it turns gray.

Also edge has a small P that indicates that the edge is in P.

When edge is in Q queue it has small Q that indicates it.

Edge can be in both queues so it will have both Q and P like this.

When edge is extracted from Q queue it turns yellow like this.

When edge is requested it turns purple like this.

When algorithm thinks the edge is out-pertinent it gets dashed like this.

When algorithm thinks the edge is in-pertinent it gets dot-dashed like this.
